meanings.definition: A group of people who have the ability to fly like birds.
meanings.sent1: The birdmen soared gracefully through the sky, their wings outstretched.
meanings.sent2: We watched the birdmen glide effortlessly above the treetops.
meanings.sent3: The birdmen decided to have a flying race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the dream, I transformed into one of the birdmen and flew to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the birdmen's aerial acrobatics at the airshow.

meanings.definition: A mythical creature with the body of a human and the wings of a bird.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of majestic birdmen who dwell in the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tapestries depicted birdmen guarding the castle gates.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous birdmen played pranks on unsuspecting travelers in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting portrayed a haunting scene of a flock of birdmen in flight.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller captivated the audience with tales of heroic birdmen saving the kingdom.
